info.name: tvtv - remove spacewaste (fullscreen)
info.description:
this style removes spacewaste on http://www.tvtv.*
specifically: removes the top, bottom bars and shrinks the left menue (reappears on hovering the small blue rectangle on the left)
removes top, left bars in movie-info-popups
also works with style 14205 and style 56280 to remove junk within.
info.additionalInfo:
v7: remove white borders in firefox
v6: remove ads/borders
v5: remove ads again
v4: updated to accomodate designchange 2013-02
v3: removed advertisements for those who don't use adblock (e.g. the preview screenshot)
v2: added popup spacesaving
